body_html:
CUDA 9.1 has been released.

Some hpp headers have been removed, namely math_functions.hpp which is included by Eigen/Core.

Noting that math_functions.h just diverts to crt/math_functions.h, I tried the same with the hpp version. I put this into /usr/local/cuda/math_functions.hpp.

#include "crt/math_functions.hpp"

Compilation and a basic test of 1.4.0 worked. Didn't run the bazel tests.
body_text:
CUDA 9.1 has been released.
Some hpp headers have been removed, namely math_functions.hpp which is included by Eigen/Core.
Noting that math_functions.h just diverts to crt/math_functions.h, I tried the same with the hpp version. I put this into /usr/local/cuda/math_functions.hpp.
#include "crt/math_functions.hpp"

Compilation and a basic test of 1.4.0 worked. Didn't run the bazel tests.
body:
CUDA 9.1 has been released.

Some hpp headers have been removed, namely math_functions.hpp which is included by Eigen/Core.

Noting that math_functions.h just diverts to crt/math_functions.h, I tried the same with the hpp version. I put this into /usr/local/cuda/math_functions.hpp.
```
#include "crt/math_functions.hpp"
```

Compilation and a basic test of 1.4.0 worked. Didn't run the bazel tests.
